name: Custom HTML Mash Up Inspired by Others
description: Bleach/SPN/Assassin's Creed/Research Navigation Menu for tumblr. Changes Posts/Followers/Activity/Drafts/Queue Things in common with each one? Research and heartbeats.
additional_info:
V.1

Mash up of several other user Styles, all of which are sourced below. I used several as bases for the mash up as you can see here {changing a name of one link or using part of the orginal as a base}, so I hope you guys enjoy it!

Credits:
